content:
{"name": "Salvation Army: Sherman Avenue Corp", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Bring photo identification and proof of eligibility (SNAP, TANF, Medicaid).

- Can also call Salvation Army District Social Services to get a referral based on low-income status. (202) 332-5000; open Mon-Fri, 8:30 am-4:30 pm.

- Referral required from social worker, community organization, or Salvation Army (no referral required for last Thursday of the month).

- Must be D.C. resident.", "email": "", "url": "https://southernusa.salvationarmy.org/nca/sherman-ave/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3335 Sherman Avenue Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Northwest Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20010", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9316034, "longitude": -77.0260746}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 829-0100", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
